titles.title: My Savior, Thou hast offered rest

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This cruel self, oh, how it strives And works within my breast, To come between Thee and my soul, And keep me back from rest.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How many subtle forms it takes Of seeming verity, As if it were not safe to rest And venture all on Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Work on, then, Lord, till on my soul Eternal light shall break, And, in Thy likeness perfected, I “satisfied” shall wake.{/lang-eng}
